data.prayer: Jesus, like with the centurion who came to you for his sick servant, please call into your house those who have great faith but are not yet yours in the county of Guangzhou
data.verse: When Jesus heard these things, he marveled at him, and turning to the crowd that followed him, said, “I tell you, not even in Israel have I found such faith.” And when those who had been sent returned to the house, they found the servant well.

data.location_label: Photo from the county of Guangzhou, Guangdong, China

data.prayer: Spirit, cause the 1,062,055 believers in Guangzhou to obey with immediate, radical, costly obedience, like Abraham.
data.verse: Then God said, “Take your son, your only son, whom you love — Isaac — and go to the region of Moriah. Sacrifice him there as a burnt offering on a mountain I will show you.” Early the next morning Abraham got up and loaded his donkey. He took with him two of his servants and his son Isaac. When he had cut enough wood for the burnt offering, he set out for the place God had told him about.

data.label_1: One disciple of Jesus for every 13 lost neighbors

data.prayer: Lord, give grace to the local leaders who shepherd the 1,062,055 believers in the county of Guangzhou.
data.verse: I am the good shepherd. The good shepherd lays down his life for the sheep.

data.prayer: Spirit, we know that cultures come and go, even in the county of Guangzhou, but the truth of your Word endures generations.
data.verse: Your Word, Lord, is eternal; it stands firm in the heavens.

data.prayer: Lord, please remember the South Asian, general people. you said you wanted worshippers of every tongue and tribe and nation, yet we know of no worshippers among them.
Father, you desire to blot out the sins of the people of Guangzhou, Guangdong, China. You said, if they turn to you, you will dissolve their sins like mist.
data.verse: I have blotted out, as a thick cloud, your transgressions, and, as a cloud, your sins. Return to me, for I have redeemed you.

data.prayer: Father, let the threatened of Guangzhou, Guangdong, China know that it is better to trust in you than to trust in humans.
data.verse: It is better to take refuge in the Lord than to trust in humans.

data.section_summary:
the county of Guangzhou, Guangdong, China has a population of 14,000,000.

We estimate Guangzhou has 1,062,055 people who might know Jesus, 226,169 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 12,711,776 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 13 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Father, put your Bible in the hands of the 12,711,776, who are far from you and live in this place.
data.verse: How can a young person stay on the path of purity? By living according to your Word. I seek you with all my heart; do not let me stray from your commands.
